about_the_game:
WELCOME TO EXILIUM

In a dystopian future where Earth has plunged into chaos, confront what remains of what once was humanity.

Exilium is a very frenetic action RogueLike where you will have to adapt to survive.

TONS OF WEAPONS
Use dozens of weapons that you will find and unlock on what was once the planet earth.

ITEMS AND LOOT
Accumulate objects and items that will help you survive and create synergies with which you can enhance your skills as a player.

EX UPGRADES
Mobility is key to get through this place, you will have access to different objects that allow you to move in many different ways, combine everything you find to find a unique play style!

PROCEDURAL RUNS
Every run in Exilium is different, map and loot will change everytime you restart! Exilium has a lot of re-playability.

DISCOVER THE LORE
Explore the world of Exilium and find out what has happened to humanity and its people.
